title.rendered: “IDF Casualties and Injuries Update: Honoring Corporal Uriah Eymelk Gushen and Sergeant (res.) Anuar Serhan”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF Spokesperson regarding the names of two IDF casualties, whose notification has been delivered to their families: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC17012024.52874

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where information and photos of the casualties are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, in a combat where Corporal Uriah Eymelk Gushen fell, a soldier and a fighting officer from the Givati Brigade were seriously injured.

Also, in the road accident in which Sergeant (res.) Anuar Serhan perished, a reserve soldier in the 910 Battalion, the Etzion Regional Brigade, was seriously injured.

The injured were taken for medical treatment at the hospital and their families have been updated.
